title: UP Assistant Teacher Result 2025
excerpt: UP Education Board has released the Assistant Teacher Result.
details: You can download the result PDF from the official website. Cutoff marks are also available.

title: SSC CGL 2025 Tier-I Admit Card
excerpt: Staff Selection Commission has released admit card for Tier-I exam.
details: Download admit card using your registration ID and password from SSC’s official portal.
